title: Senators announces five day salary to flood victims
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 19 (APP):Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani on Tuesday announced donating five daysâ€™ salary of senators for the rehabilitation of flood victims.
He said senators could also contribute more if they wished.
Minister for Law and Justice Azam Nazeer Tarar also announced donating his one-month salary to support relief efforts in flood-hit areas.
